Material description¶

The table below contains the material properties used by the Numerical Geolab materials. The user can use its own material libraries without the need to follow the properties settings described here.

Cauchy3D-DP-PR-TEMP 62 \( K \) \( G \) \( \chi \) \( \eta_f \) \(\beta^\star\) \(k_T\) \(\rho C\) \(\alpha\) \(\lambda^\star\) NA \(\tan{\phi}\) \(c\) \(\tan{\psi}\) \(H_{s\phi}\) \(H_{sc}\)NA NA NA NA \(\eta\)OoB OoB OoB OoB OoB OoB OoB OoB OoB
